description: Seychelles is an archipelago of more than 115 islands with two distinct collections of islands, some comprised of granite and others of coral. The Main islands are Mahe, Praslin and La Digue with a total area of 455 sq. Km., an Exclusive Economic Zone of 1.34 sq. Km. with coastline of approximately 746 km.This dataset comprise all the information of the Islands and reclamation land in the Seychelles.
name: Seychelles Islands BaseMap
